payload.content: NVIDIA's CEO Jensen Huang revealed groundbreaking physical AI, autonomous robots, and industrial automation at CES 2026.

name: NVIDIA's CEO Jensen Huang revealed groundbreaking physical AI, autonomous robots
content: NVIDIA's CEO Jensen Huang revealed groundbreaking physical AI, autonomous robots, and industrial automation at CES 2026.

payload.content: NVIDIA is demonstrating how AI is transitioning from digital screens to real-world applications in factories, robotics, and manufacturing systems, utilizing technologies like Omniverse and Isaac Sim, and the Cosmos foundation model.

content: NVIDIA is demonstrating how AI is transitioning from digital screens to real-world applications in factories, robotics, and manufacturing systems, utilizing technologies like Omniverse and Isaac Sim, and the Cosmos foundation model.

payload.content: Seammens, Cadence, and Synopsis are collaborating with NVIDIA to integrate AI, simulation, and agentic systems across the entire industrial lifecycle, from design and planning to production and operations.

content: Seammens, Cadence, and Synopsis are collaborating with NVIDIA to integrate AI, simulation, and agentic systems across the entire industrial lifecycle, from design and planning to production and operations.

payload.content: The CES 2026 event highlights next-generation robotics, AI-powered vehicles, industrial automation, and AI physics, offering a glimpse into the future of manufacturing and autonomous systems globally.
